content: 請讀取readme.md 觀察要做什麼前置作業... 老師說這週要做到的事情如下...
Analyzed requirements: 1. App URI in README (Deployment), 2. RN source + AI interaction history, 3. Data folder with exported data (>12h span). Suggested starting with App functionality.
第三個我們可以等12小時來重新輸入另一筆資料，沒關係。那你建議我們從哪邊開始著手？
Suggested implementing Emogo emotion recording feature first. Guided user to install async-storage.
Implemented `app/(tabs)/index.js` with emotion selection, AsyncStorage persistence, and data export functionality. Created `data` directory.
我掃描QR code但他說找不到資料
Suggested using `npx expo start --tunnel` to resolve connection issues.
手機還是不行 但網址可以 接下來適合做什麼？
Since web works, logic is fine. Proceeded to EAS Build setup. Modified `app.json` to remove template owner info and update package names. Guided user to run `eas build`.
遇到錯誤 `adb executable doesn't seem to work`... 所以他問我 Install and run the Android build on an emulator? 要選No?
Confirmed to select No. Clarified that `eas build` runs on cloud and we just need the URL.
Updated README.md with the App URI.
ai_interaction 要改成json file 我不能等12個小時後再輸入就好嘛？
Agreed to wait 12 hours for real data. Converted interaction history to JSON format.
